answers.answer: Lol I took mine friday and minutes later my baby was moving so much. Its normal I think its the extra sugar.
What's a GTT test if you dont mind me asking?

Its a glucose tolerance test that will test you for diabetes! You should take it between 24&28 weeks. You drink a super sugary drink( mine tasted like Orange soda) they have you wait an hour and then they take blood. Nothing scary(:
That drink was good at first but it had a bad after taste. Yuck!
Yes it did. It made my throat tingel all weird?? Idk just glad I could keep it down(:
Mine tasted like over sugary, very flat, sprite. And yes all the sugar makes your baby go bonkers.

question: So I just got back from the doctor and took my GTT test. Ever since I drank that drink my baby has been doing flips and turns and just kicking away. Is this normal ?? Lol he's being soo funny!
title: GTT test...quick question!
